Elected Member, Academic Council, University of Calicut (Since 2008).
Chairman, PG Board of Studies in Audiovisual Communication, University of Calicut (2016-19).
Chairman, PG Board of Studies in Journalism and Mass Communication, Kannur University (2015-17).
Chairman, UG Board of Studies in Journalism and Mass Communication, University of Calicut (2013-16).
Member, Postgraduate Board of Studies in Journalism and Mass Communication, Kannur University (2013-15).
Member, Faculty of Journalism, University of Calicut (2013-19).
Member, Faculty of Communication, Kannur University (2015-17).
Member, PG Board of Studies in Audiovisual Communication, University of Calicut, Since 2020
Member, Postgraduate Board of Studies in Journalism and Mass Communication, St’ Joseph College of Women (Autonomous), Irinjalakkuda, Thrissur (Since 2019).
Member, Board of Studies for Journalism and Mass Communication, and Video Production, Mar Ivanios Autonomous College, Thiruvananthapuram (2014-18).
Member, Board of Studies in Media and Information Science, Farook Autonomous College, Calicut (2014-16).
Member, PG Board of Studies in Journalism and Mass Communication, University of Calicut (2013-2019)
Editor, International Journal for Advanced Research in Emerging Disciplines (ISSN:2348-3342)
Research Guide at the Department of Journalism and Mass Communication, University of Calicut. Area of Specialisation: Political Communication.
Chairman, PG Board of Examiners in Journalism and Mass Communication, University of Calicut (Since 2016).
Chairman, UG Board of Examiners in Journalism and Mass Communication, University of Calicut (2007-2016).

Member, Examination & Viva Board, Dept. of JMC, University of Calicut, Mar Ivanios Autonomous College, Thiruvananthapuram, Farook Autonomous College, Calicut and St’ Joseph Autonomous College, Devagiri, Kozhikode (Since 2014).
Chairman, Board of Question Paper Setters, University of Kerala (Since 2018).
Chairman, Board of Question Paper Setters, Kannur University (Since 2019).
Member, Board of Question Paper Setters, University of Kerala (Since 2015).
Member, Board of Question Paper Setters,Mar Ivanios Autonomous College, Thiruvananthapuram, Farook Autonomous College, Calicut and St’ Joseph Autonomous College, Devagiri, Kozhikode (Since 2015).
Research Guide at the Department of Journalism and Mass Communication, University of Calicut since 2019. Area of Specialisation is Political Communication.
